translation.text: Due to a switch failure at Chicago Union Station, outbound trains may be delayed up to 20 minutes behind schedule, some track changes may be necessary on the south concourse. Please check gate boards prior to boarding your train.
ME The Museum Campus east elevator is back in service.
The Museum Campus east elevator is back in service.

BNSF, SWS, and HCD passengers may experience heavy congestion at Chicago Union Station due to switch problems. Please listen to announcements for updated information on train boarding. Thank you for your cooperation and understanding.

BNSF, SWS, and HCD passengers may experience heavy congestion at Chicago Union Station due to switch problems. Please listen to announcements for updated information on train boarding. Thank you for your cooperation and understanding.
MED Van Buren Station Platform Elevator
The Van Buren Station Platform elevator is back in service.

Due to a switch failure at Chicago Union Station, inbound and outbound trains may be delayed up to 20 minutes behind schedule, Some track changes may be necessary on the south concourse. Please check gate boards prior to boarding your train.
Monday through Friday, from 9AM to 4PM, the 79th St., 87th St., and 103rd St. stations may not be fully ADA accessible due to nearby station construction.

HCD train #917, scheduled to arrive Joliet at 5:56 PM, is stopped near Summit due to freight train interference . The duration of this delay is unknown. Metra will provide updates as information becomes available.
The 95th St/Chicago State University station will close March 3, 2025 - Station Rehab and Expansion Project

On Monday, March 3, the 95th st/Chicago State University station will close for approximately 2 years to undergo a rehabilitation and expansion project. During this time passengers should use 91st street and 103rd st/Rosemoor stations as alternates. Updates will be provided.
Beginning May 9, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station Reconstruction

Beginning May 9, 2025, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station reconstruction. Full site construction is expected to continue through Spring 2026. An accessible alternative is the 111th Street Morgan Park Station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is restored.
Michigan and Randolph Elevator Out of Service

The Michigan Avenue elevator located on the southwest corner of Michigan and Randolph is permanently out of service. Customers can use the South Water elevator, 225 N Michigan Avenue, or McCormick Place as an alternate boarding station.
BNSF train #1247 scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station at 4:00 pm, will not operate due switch problems. Train #1253 will be the next train to accommodate passengers to Aurora.

Due to a switch failure at Chicago Union Station, inbound and outbound trains may be delayed up to 20 minutes behind schedule, Some track changes may be necessary on the south concourse. Please check gate boards prior to boarding your train.

BNSF, SWS, and HCD passengers may experience heavy congestion at Chicago Union Station due to switch problems. Please listen to announcements for updated information on train boarding. Thank you for your cooperation and understanding.
MED 51st Street East Elevator Out of Service
The 51st Street East elevator is out of service. Customers can use McCormick Place or 55th/56th/57th Street as alternate boarding stations.
